“Not impressed, I did not feel high at all I smoked about an 8th and never really enjoyed the high. Not intense too weak didn't help with my lower back pain I probably will not get this again.”
“It stinks really good, made me feel relaxed stress free and a little light headed and I got super sleepy and I got dry mouth but other than that it's a good strain if you want to just post up”

“I know I just reviewed this but so what it's so good. ..the vanilla blueberry muffins that this lovely girl is definitely gets my attention. .hiding 2 Oz from myself. ..can't wait 8 months from now I'll crack open an O and save the next for a patient's birthday lol CDXX Boutique”

“Dense nugs with very distinct, dark purple color and bright orange hairs. Smoked nice, although did not have too sweet of a taste as expected by the appearance of the nugs and the description of strain. Very hard hitting, sativa constituent was dominant for sure. Head changing and calmative while having the couch lock attributes of the indica.”
“tastes like blueberry muffins”

“This strain is perfect to chill with anytime.
It smells and tastes like Blueberries and reminds me of Big League Chew" Bubblegum.

column1: This is a great strain for beginners (low THC) to connoisseurs (Quality and Flavor).”"

column3:
“Quite shocked to find out this is an Indica -- I thought this was a hybrid!  It feels very euphoric indeed and had me feeling quite happy and productive.  

The flowers were quite exotic looking:  The bright green buds covered in juicy crystals were complemented quite nicely by a contrast of orange pistils and trichomes.  

The description of the strain leaves me a bit curious.  Did the grower produce a hybrid Bluebe...”
“This strain always delivers when it comes to easing physical pain. The high is pretty mild. With a taste that fits the name, Blueberry  has become very popular.”
“much enjoyed. would buy again”
“Excellent Indica. Strong but still euphoric and allows you to remain engaged. We were impressed with the smell and a very high thc content!”
“Left me stuck to the couch in a serious daze.  Found it tough to carry on a conversation after smoking.  Will definitely put you in a relaxed state with a moderate body-buzz.”
“This blew my socks off for a good 4hours. best sleep ever that night”
“Blueberry is always a good go-to strain. It is lightly stony & just simply always a good choice.”
“This is one of my favorite . The taste and the calmness after smoking. Highly recommend.”

“I love any of the Blueberry strains. It offers such nice release of body and mind tension. A happy strain with calming properties. The buds were beautiful and frosty with tricomes. It is the perfect go to, when you need a great Indica for bedtime, relaxing time, or anytime  !”

“(This review is strictly for the batch I recieved) 

I purchased this from Ganja Gourmet in Denver, Colorado and I think I got a bad batch or something completely different. It did not taste like blueberry  at all. Infact, it had more of a peppery aftertaste. It gave me a sleepy high with slight paranoia because of the strength.   I did, however, get a little aroused so that's a plus. I really was looking forward to ...”

“this was more or less the fall Harvest that my grower had so I have been smoking blueberry for about 4 months and it's been a good time. my anxiety has been mild my depression has been nearly non-existent and with the exception of the current political climate I feel pretty damn good all around. blueberry may not seem like the choice but it works for an all-day strain”
“Smooth indica, felt relaxed afterwards”

“I'm smoke ganja all day every day, so I have tried many things, but blueberry is my favorite! I smoke at night before going to work 12-8am  and instead of making me sleepy like everyone else, it actually helps me to feel relax but still be active and focus. PLUS THE SMELL AND THE TASTE ARE SO SMOOTH!”
“Strong fast high, I found it wore off kind of fast. The taste was amazing.”
“i was knocked out after smoking this.  a great sleep  inducing high. not much els to say except you wont be up for long”
“the 22% blue at the stem is the stoney real deal  !!!!”

“absolutely outstanding strain with an unbelievably sweet taste. Relaxing and very, very comfortable. It can also be purchased by Greenridge Organics in Fairfield California. I use it to come back pain from torn tendons and PTSD”
“Really good strain, I was really relaxed and euphoric. Very strong aswell.”
“It has a beautiful smell and taste. You get a nice body high that still allows you to function.”
“Tasty & Toasty!!!”

“I'd say 3.5 :) it's not a bad high, and the flavor is delicious! But the smoke is harsh and there are much better strains.

It has a heavenly blueberry smell and the flavor is fruity and woody with a few spicy notes almost like nutmeg :) but it's still too harsh for my baby lungs :,( 

It's great for migraines although it's not doing anything for my nerve pain :( 

For some it's helpful with their depression :) but f...”
“I am seriously way higher than I expected. I can feel it in my junk my legs and my head are just on the floor. Jesus lord, I am flying. Throat burns. This is an intense experience.”
“Very fruity and mild. Fuzzy and uplifting feel. Beautiful aroma.”
“Really good for night time and relax and also good for day time !”
“A good strain before bed to help take off the edge and to get a good nights sleep”

“Purchased this strain at a dispensary in Ottawa, seeking a strain to help with depression and anxiety since I just finished using my prescribed medication. Surely enough following the purchase, I found on Leafly that it was great for what I was looking for as well as pain of course. Conveniently I had a headache by the time I got home and after smoking a few joints no pain relief occured whatsoever, had to resort to ...”
“I respect Mr, B Berry and his fine smell.  Ohhhhh so fn dope!!!!!    I bought an ounce and layered in some home made candle wax so I could arome the house with this smell.   So fire.”
“Dosent get any better than the pain and stress relief that come with a fat bowl of the blueberry! If you can get your hands on that Northern Cali or Oregon varities especially.”

“Feeling pretty mellow 
Wouldn't describe as fatigue inducing more for a chill evening (movies and bath) would be good for stress”

“An old favorite that never disappoints. I’ve always found this strain to be mellow and calming, even Noble Farms Sativa dominant version. I usually get the standard Indica Blueberry and regardless of mood this always helps calm me without making me feel tired like Romulan ( another favorite) can. It’s a classic for a reason. No anxiety,racing heart or paranoia.”

“Had some shatter blueberry not to long ago. So picked up some flower blueberry and twiggy twisted a j'ski and yes instant blueberry after taste and super indica couch lock soon followed. Blueberry get you some get real comfortable and get ready to blast off!”
“Great quality laid back”
“This one legitimately tasted like blurberries. Great stuff definite reorder. Can smoke a lot without crashing too hard. Perfect for doobies ;0 If your gonna get an indica this is the one !”

“By far my second favorite strain right behind Critical Jack. It makes you so uplifted. Gives you a very nice happy high. The taste is sweet too. It doesn't give me a headache, which is my favorite part.”

“Blueberry Web CBD BLAZE cartridge Wild Rogue Extracts in Oregon. 43% Cbd 23 % thc tested Kenevir Research.  Smell of cartridge wreaked of Blueberry.Huge flavor burst of Blue Berry Pie. Blew out pain.No worries in the world clear focus with nice body buzz. Couple of puffs goes a long way shiptz was very tasty hard to put down.
Genetics unknown Blueberry x Web ?”
“it gets you high, but the taste and smell aren't that great. also it made us feel a little sultry”

“Picked up this strain from Tilray in a 15g pack, first impressions were that it made me lazy and hungry. But if you're like me and want to avoid the munchies" this strain is great if you're Into exploring nature and being outside which will calm the munchies. I recommend going for a hike in the mountains and smoking at the top of the trail. Overall great relaxing strain with a happy buzz!”"
“A relative made chocolate chip cookie dough chocolate fudge balls with this strain and Northern Lights mixed. Super giggly happy the whole night.”
“fun taste of blueberry”
“Verry  astonishing. Taste like blueberry instantly makes me feel better when I smoke amazing taste only true blueberry I've ever had definitely worth  it”
“love the smell and taste, it really does smell and taste like Blueberry!”

“As I cracked open the bag and the sweet berry aroma hit my nostrils, I knew Blueberry lived up to its name. One of the best smelling cannabis strains on Earth in my opinion, Blueberry is an Indica which also seems to carry some Sativa-like effects. Upon first smoke I noticed a deeply relaxed feeling and a mild wave of euphoria, but was not glued to the couch. Don't get me wrong, sitting on my ass was still incredibly...”
“Creeper and not long lasting but took my mind off the pain”
“After having one rip of this I decided to take the train home. Time went by so slowly and everything was so beautiful.”
“This was only the first time I've smoked Blueberry, but I smoked two bowls. It was a pretty alright high, but I like stronger stuff.”

“This strain quickly took me from a talkative, hyper person to a very mellow, slurring-words mess in a matter of 2 minutes. I found it very hard to communicate effectively, and I didn't care. This is a very heavy body stone.”
“A favorite go to strain.  Not the best, not the strongest, but you can smoke this every day and be just as happy.”
“Heavy hitting, strong and sweet with fantastic calming and sleepiness inducing effects. Makes it slightly harder to concentrate and is likely to put you on the couch.”

“Blueberry is an average-priced strain here in Holland. It is priced at 8 euro's per gram at my local coffeeshop. The guys there told me the strain has around 15% THC. This strain is a indica-dominant hybrid, about 80% indica. 
 
I have smoked Blueberry through a bong and in joints. Its a very mellow, relaxed smoke. Blueberry has a real nutty and fruity taste/smell and it gives a real chilled out body high. 

Would ad...”

“I've battled severe anxiety, depression and insomnia fire several years and many strains are hit or miss but Blueberry is definitely a hit! I've been sleeping 7 hour nights like nothing and I feel great even the day after! I also have chronic knee pain and couldn't feel a damn thing after smoking this stuff! beautiful pain killing effects! general feelings of ease and comfort throughout. The only cons for me are seve...”
“Love this strain. blueberries are my favorite food anyways”
“Smell and taste are on point”
“Smells like blue berry pancakes, nice oldschool sweet flavor.”
“For me this was the worst indica strain I've tried. Except for the initial lift this strain left me super anxious and gave me a nasty headache. Not my cup of tea.”
“This was a good time I thought this strain was a very good choice its left feelin relaxed and happy (good shit)”
“Blueberry has a great smell, very pungent! Great for relaxing.”

“Excellent and pungent blueberry aroma. Tastes sweet as well. I use this for my bedtime med. It's perfect mixed with a bit of Chernobyl because for me, Blueberry doesn't help quite as much with my pain but does relax me so I'm good and ready for sleep. Been medicating with it for a week or so and it's become a number one fave.”

“I haven't sampled many strains but this was my favorite so far. I suffer from anxiety and this did an awesome job of relieving that. was very smooth and the body effect was very relaxing. would recommend this indica for stress and anxiety!”

“Good strain, felt like more of an uplifting indica which wasn't what I was expecting. Would be great for daytime sedation without being too couch locked. Wouldn't recommend for evening use as I didn't feel very drowsy. The smell definitely reminded me of blueberries while the taste was earthy and smooth. Definitely give this a try if you have a chance!”
“im a regular smoker this blueberry was amazing ive hit 15 bowls and i feel amazing nice and relaxed definitely a solid 8/10”
“Nice!”

“2.5 / 5 Meh. Was okay nothin special. Remember to take every review with pinch of salt! #StayTuned #CGMurray

EDIT: See my review on Blueberry Kush... way fucking better than this strain xoxo”

“Definitly one of the weakest strains I've smoked. 
Made pain go away significantly but not for very long.
Wouldn't recommend.”
“Just finished smoking this, Jesus Christ I'm highhh”

“it's all slow right now. / 
even those ocean waves, they're... / 
like ten miles an hour.”
“This dank is seriously delicious! Beautiful bud.”
“YUM, YUM, YUM. Great indica.”
“Awesome uplifted sativa”

“Honestly one of the best experiences I've ever had. Roommate picked some up for my birthday, shared a bowl with about 1/2 g between the two of us. High didn't kick in fully until after we cashed the bowl about 10-15 minutes later, but as soon as we stood up it hit me like a brick wall, very similar to how edibles feel. The high was phenomenal, a great sense of happiness and almost euphoria, plus a nice energy boost. ...”

“Has been a long time favorite of mine! The taste is blueberry vanilla muffins , at least this seed ...now clones lol. With almost every pheno and blueberry cut I've tried it's like this. Ya smoke and smoke and smoke the joint ok. And when your hitting it you definitely can taste the terps! While all that is happening your like yeah I'm smoking a doob nothing major just the best taste ever lol but when you are done an...”

“Fine at first, after many hours or the next day I noticed strong ADHD-TYPE symptoms with extreme multitasking, irritability, hyper focus and executive dysfunction. Quite uncomfortable,  would not do again.”
“left me totally underwhelmed, dry, waaaay too quick to crumble, didn't see the advertised thc content at all.”

“my favorite ever!!!
wish I could give more than 5 stars ;)”

“Just had a smoking session on this fruity beauty! Super chilled but super chatting, energetic but baked. Flavours became intense in munch, video games are incredible. Bright colours and smoke rings. Best part of the whole thing was the moment I took my bra off, best, feeling, ever.”

“BLUEBERRY! One of my all time favorite Indica. I can always go to blueberry and not get disappointed...unless it has low THC for whatever reason!

Very Smooth, burns somewhat quick, flavorful, chokes up nice, fun to mix with fruity strains, (Lemon Kush, Super Silver Lemon Haze to name a few.)

A must try for all.”
“Haven't seen her in years In md really miss this strain de delicious taste last really long after smoked”

“3 tokes was mild. It was kind of a creeper. It did have some nice body sensations, but was just ok for pain management. Had 3 more tokes later, and felt a bit more.    5 tokes. First 3 So tasty! Next 2 not  bad. This amount came on much more quickly. Next time, 5 tokes before bath.  Similar experience. Nice. Last 2 at bedtime made for sweet visuals while I listened to music and fell asleep. This dose much better for ...”

“They were hashy buds that had a slight smell of blueberry. Had some serious dry mouth at first but water fixed that problem. Very happy high energetic high! I couldn't stop smiling while playing poker with my buddy. (: And definetly Sativa, after a couple bowls i just went outside and strolled around town. So relaxing... (:”
“This is awesome! Not super potent but really fuzzy and tingly. Awesome to combine with other strains”
“It doesn't get me high at all. And that goes for Blue Cheese, Blue Dream, anything and everything with Blueberry genetics in it. Easily my least favorite strain.”
“What of the best relaxing strains ever! To good!”
“dense buds, well cured. smells good, sweet. musty, sweet smoke.”

“I definitely would not recommend this strain for pain... almost felt worse. But, If the high you seek is a creative one, THIS is your strain. Cannabinoids levels are a tad low, but my mind felt open and creative and free.....”

“I have tried blueberry at several different dispensers, and I am usually satisfied. However, I must let you know that my wonderful caregivers have it down to a science. Karmaceuticals produces the best medicine in the whole Denver area. No matter what they always have something for me and it is always top notch medication. I recommend that everyone go give them a shot and I promise you will return again. Karmaceutica...”
“Tastes just like a Blueberry! Ripe and tasty! Calmes my stomach and nerves, allows me to eat.”
